[align=center][img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/4422/headerni.png[/img][/align]

[2/26/2011]Hello everybody and welcome to this weeks HF news. First of all I'd like to thank [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=542851][b][color=#0066FF]Î©Ð¼ÎµÉ¢Î±[/color][/b][/url] for pulling all of this together, he's currently having real life issues so he wasn't able to make this thread. You can read all about his efforts [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1084875][b][u]here[/u][/b][/url]. 
There is a lot of interesting facts and hopefully the news will be done with a large crew like this permanently. Now start reading!

[align=center][img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/8496/headlinesr.png[/img][/align]

The difference between the dead and banned groups was confirmed by [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#00BFFF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] in [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=89623][b][color=#0066FF]Mark Webber â™¥'s[/color][/b][/url] thread, which can be found at the bottom of [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1079358][u][b]this[/b][/u][/url] thread.

Also the former rats crew co-leader [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#32CD32][b]xerotic[/b][/color][/url] was recently promoted to staff and he's already starting too clean up the forum and members, so keep up the good work [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#32CD32][b]xerotic[/b][/color][/url] (If anyone would like to congratulate him on his promotion do so in [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1082594][u][b]this[/b][/u][/url] thread).

For the recruiting forum two official groups are currently recruiting new members. One group is named "D.S. Inc" and the other is "Reviewers", you can apply to the D.S. Inc group [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1073637][u][b]here[/b][/u][/url] & you can apply to the reviewers group [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=977663][u][b]here[/b][/u][/url].

Nomination's for the member of the month(MOTM) award began in the l33t discussion forum. If anyone would like to nominate someone or them selves do so in [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1084968][u][b]this[/b][/u][/url] thread, if you aren't l33t/ub3r and you want to nominate someone/yourself I suggest you purchase l33t ðŸ™‚. 

[align=center][img]http://img211.imageshack.us/img211/300/usernews.png[/img][/align]

Welcome to this weeks edition of User News. This week had a little drama as well as a bit of a breakthrough for the users on HF. Let's talk about the drama first. The user [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=159394][b][color=#0066FF]Sudo[/color][/b][/url] was hacked earlier this week by some person with the MSN of "emo_pwnage@hotmail.com" but it did get resolved in the end and [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=159394][b][color=#0066FF]Sudo[/color][/b][/url] is now back incharge of his account. You can find the full details of [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=159394][b][color=#0066FF]Sudo's[/color][/b][/url] compromised account [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1077799][b][u]here[/u][/b][/url].

[color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color]

The user [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=81075][b][color=#0066FF]Robbieava[/color][/b][/url] was recently added into the mentor group. The mentor group is a private group and so far former staff members are in the group and robbieava is the first non former staff member to be accepted into the group. You can read up on the group [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=405758][b][u]here[/u][/b][/url], for the record this group has a little bit of moderator powers so they're considered as  semi-mods(In my opinion).

[color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color]

The user [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=295449][b][color=#0066FF]Quiet[/color][/b][/url] was also hacked and only had it resolved in an hour through doing a system restore. I was appointed to inform [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=65581][b][color=#32CD32]Skill[/color][/b][/url] of when his machine was disinfected. These two users losing their account permanently would have been quite the awful thing for HF, so I do urge all users to please not save their passwords or ad least keep your HF password different. Read the very little bit of information on [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=295449][b][color=#0066FF]Quiet[/color][/b][/url] [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1083976][b][u]here[/u][/b][/url].

[color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color]

In the "Breakthrough" news I mentioned earlier the users [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=230276][b][color=#0066FF]Phirewire[/color][/b][/url], [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=516061][b][color=#0066FF]IniSiz[/color][/b][/url], and [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=385801][b][color=#0066FF]Indirect[/color][/b][/url](myself) decided to create an Anti-virus specifically created by the users of HF. This came after [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=230276][b][color=#0066FF]Phirewire[/color][/b][/url] created a thread that HF needed a project, unlike others who didn't fully pursue it all 3 of us decided to make sub-forum specific recruitment threads, links will be provided at the end of this news section. If you wish to join this please feel free to join through one of the recruitment threads that fits your skills.
[u][b]WhiteHat[/b][/u] - http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1086251
[u][b]GFX[/b][/u] - http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1086315
[u][b]Web Developing[/b][/u] - http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1086263
[u][b]Coding[/b][/u] - http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1086390
[u][b]Main Thread[/b][/u] - http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1086214

[align=center][img]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/6619/othernews.png[/img][/align]

[align=center]The 24th of february we had a bit of a downtime. Omniscient announced with his exact words 'Looks like something occurred with LAN connection to the mysql server. Datacenter appears to have it corrected now. Sorry for downtime and it was not due to attack or DDOS.', but they just said it was a loose RJ45. So as stated before this was not caused by DDoS,DoS,or any other type of attack. It was natural and resolved, you can read all about it [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1086906][b][u]here[/u][/b][/url].[/align]

[align=center][img]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/8763/videootw.png[/img]

[video=youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kTFZyl7hfBw[/video]
If you want to watch part 2 of 'Can I have your number' go [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ILbS7K2iF70][b][u]HERE[/u][/b][/url].[/align]

[align=center][img]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/1076/interviews.png[/img][/align]

[list][*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: Hello Reviewer and thank you for allowing this interview. Too start off, what made you join hack Forums?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=129832][color=#0066FF][b]Reviewer[/b][/color][/url]: I joined Hack Forums when Rune Scape was my actually sort of part of my life. My friend [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=127542][color=#0066FF][b]Metamorphism[/b][/color][/url] was the one who had told me about Hack Forums. He was telling me about the activity here and I was really interested in how it is going to be like. Thus, one day I joined and saw the beauty of Hack Forums.

[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: Exactly what drew you to hackforums?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=129832][color=#0066FF][b]Reviewer[/b][/color][/url]: Rune Scape drew me to Hack Forums. When I first joined, all I cared about was Rune Scape. I was extremely excited and inspired by the amount of dumps that was posted here. I remember [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=58921][b][color=#0066FF]Teh[/color][/b][/url] posting a vast majority of Rune Scape accounts in the Rune Scape section whilst it had existed. I currently do not play Rune Scape and I am not willing to go back into it. It is addictive, however, it is not very great when Jagex is always banning your accounts for macroing. I then moved on to Remote Administration Tools, coding, and learning things which had helped me a lot as I now have an improved knowledge about computing, security, programs, coding, hacking tools etc. 

[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: Do you think of yourself as a high quality member, if so how are you high quality?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=129832][color=#0066FF][b]Reviewer[/b][/color][/url]: Yes, I believe that I am rather high quality member. I assume that most of my posts do not violate the rules of Hack Forums. I do not flame members, I do choose to argue and fight over things. I am not a sort of person who is lounging all the time. I take part in all kind of threads in Hack Forums. I report all the posts that violate our rules. I do not post in low quality or with an attitude. I know when I am supposed to speaking and when I am not. 

[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: What do you think you're truly known for on hackforums?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=129832][color=#0066FF][b]Reviewer[/b][/color][/url]: I think that I maybe known due to my name being "Reviewer", it is attractive and sometimes people even private message me asking for reviewing. However, I do explain to them that, although my name is Reviewer and I have a user bar with the text "Reviewer" written on it, I am not allowed to unofficially review their eBook and I do tell them to request a leader of the official reviewers crew using the template (The canned speech has more information, thus, I post that to help them out). I am an official reviewer and I am proud of it, it is like the only reason that I maybe known by. However, I do know that some people know me because of the crews that I am in. I like to volunteer a lot in the crews that I am in and contribute in a sort of way.

[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: If you've ever contributed to hackforums how have you contributed?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=129832][color=#0066FF][b]Reviewer[/b][/color][/url]: I have donated to Hack Forums and that is why I had received a few of awards. I have upgraded myself and a few members at Hack Forums. I am willing to upgrade more members, however, hosting sales rate is poor. I have not made much profit from my hosting company but I am keeping it up by earning money other ways to help Hack Forums and my current customers. I have provided many services in the past and I will be creating new contest's and free services for Hack Forums so that I am just like every other member here. 

[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: Thank you for accepting this interview, is there anything else you'd like too say?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=129832][color=#0066FF][b]Reviewer[/b][/color][/url]: Yes, I appreciate the fact that you had interviewed me. I hope you get some answers and I am more than happy to help you with anything you require assistance with. Thank you very much and have a good time at Hack Forums.[/list]

[color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color][color=#00BFFF]-[/color][color=white]-[/color]

[list][*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: Hello Kr4z1 and welcome to HF news interview section. Too start off, what made you join hack Forums?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=143654][b][color=#32CD32]Kr4z1[/color][/b][/url]: A friend of mine had told me about a site where we could make some money and at first I wasn't interested. I've been here since Late 08 on my first account. When I came back from my break I created a new one because I did not know the info to my old one. About a half a year later once I was more active I had Ibf merge both accounts into on and this accounts join date stayed. -_-

[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: Exactly what drew you to hackforums?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=143654][b][color=#32CD32]Kr4z1[/color][/b][/url]: The money at first, then I was interested in making tutorials and such.

[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: Do you think of yourself as a high quality member, if so how are you high quality?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=143654][b][color=#32CD32]Kr4z1[/color][/b][/url]: I use to be very fond of the word HQ when I was extremely active. I would to just consider myself as a average poster among the community instead of this godly poster some might think I am. Occasionally I do like to troll. For instance my last troll as the scam report I made on TRRS. Was very lolsworthy.

[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: What do you think you're truly known for on hackforums?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=143654][b][color=#32CD32]Kr4z1[/color][/b][/url]: Mostly the upgrades and being a lounge whore. I love my lounge.

[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: If you've ever contributed to hackforums how have you contributed?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=143654][b][color=#32CD32]Kr4z1[/color][/b][/url]: Most of my contributions have been member upgrades (from l33t to ub3r). I think I've done a total of 20 or so. I've donated very little directly to Omni himself. Awhile ago I offered him a donation but he actually declined it and told me to keep the money. Omni, what a generous man <3.

[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: Thank you for accepting this interview, is there anything else you'd like too say?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=143654][b][color=#32CD32]Kr4z1[/color][/b][/url]: Stay classy HF and watch out for my crackdowns. =) 

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=565350][color=#0066FF][b]Christianâ˜¢[/b][/color][/url]: When you were promoted to staff what was your reaction?
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=143654][b][color=#32CD32]Kr4z1[/color][/b][/url]: I was promoted staff a few months ago and I was really excited and happy. [/list]
